General.Name: SPECO Ltd
General.Description: SPECO Ltd. manufactures and supplies stationary, mobile, and recycling asphalt plants for use in the road construction in South Korea and internationally. It also provides stationary and mobile concrete batch plants; jaw and cone crushing plants; and wind power plants, as well as asphalt mixing plants. In addition, the company is involved in the maritime business. The company was formerly known as ShinSaeng Plant Engineering Co. and changed its name to SPECO Ltd. in September 1997. SPECO Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Eumseong-gun, South Korea.
